queries.q: SELECT Account.Id, Account.Name, Account.Ownership, Account.S4SMD_Status__c, Account.S4SDUNS__c, Account.S4SIfA__c, Account.BillingStreet, Account.BillingCountry, Account.BillingState, Account.BillingPostalCode, Account.S4SCMD_NAME1__c, Account.S4SCMD_NAME2__c, Account.S4SCMD_NAME3__c, Account.S4SSiemens_Account_Type__c, Account.ParentId, Account.BillingCity, Account.ShippingCountry, Account.ShippingPostalCode, Account.ShippingCity, Account.ShippingState, Account.ShippingStreet, Account.Phone, Account.Fax, Account.S4SEmail__c, Account.Website, Account.S4SSISIC_Ship_To__r.Name, Account.S4SSISIC_Ship_To__r.S4SIndustry_Description__c, Account.S4SACCOUNT_LegacyID__c, Account.S4SAccount_Name_SieSales__c, Account.S4SAccount_Name_International__c, Account.RecordType.Name, Contact.Account.Id, Contact.Email,  Contact.FirstName, Contact.LastName,  Contact.Salutation, Contact.Name, Contact.Id, Contact.S4SLanguage__c , Contact.Owner.Name, Contact.Owner.S4SGID_Technical__c, Contact.Owner.Id, Contact.Owner.Email, Contact.S4SCONTACT_LegacyID__c, Contact.DPML__Employee_Number__c FROM AccountContactRelation @{concat(body('Prepare_Where_Clauses')?['account_contact_clause'], string(' LIMIT 200'))}

queries.q: SELECT Id, Name, Ownership, S4SMD_Status__c, S4SDUNS__c, S4SIfA__c, BillingStreet, BillingCountry, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, S4SCMD_NAME1__c, S4SCMD_NAME2__c, S4SCMD_NAME3__c, S4SSiemens_Account_Type__c, ParentId, BillingCity, ShippingCountry, ShippingPostalCode, ShippingCity, ShippingState, ShippingStreet, Phone, Fax, S4SEmail__c, Website, S4SSISIC_Ship_To__r.Name, S4SSISIC_Ship_To__r.S4SIndustry_Description__c, S4SACCOUNT_LegacyID__c, S4SAccount_Name_SieSales__c, S4SAccount_Name_International__c, RecordType.Name FROM Account  @{concat(body('Prepare_Where_Clauses')?['account_clause'], string(' LIMIT 200'))}
